text: The Walt Disney Concert Hall is a concert hall in Los Angeles, California. It is the home of the Los Angeles Philharmonic orchestra. It seats 2,265 people. The building opened in 2003. It was designed by Frank Gehry. The acoustics of the hall are very good. The hall has a very large pipe organ which was completed in 2004. It was built by the German organ builder, Caspar Glatter- GÃ¶tz. It has 6,125 pipes. ==Sources== == Other websites == * Official website at Los Angeles Music Center Category:Concert halls in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Los Angeles Category:Music in Los Angeles Category:2003 establishments in California
title: Walt Disney Concert Hall
